title: How did Charles Babbage invented computer at that time? - Quora

response.answer_text: He designed a mechanical device under the principle that you could design something that could solve complex mathematics purely through mechanical control. He did not invent anything resembling modern computers if that’s what you’re imagining, but he did still invent, or at least conceptualize, the idea of computers. He was also assisted by Ada Lovelace, who due to her contributions with ideas such as conditional loops is considered the world’s first programmer.
